dataset_id: GPM Ground Validation GOES 15 Visible and Infrared Images OLYMPEX V1
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: GPM Ground Validation GOES 15 Visible and Infrared Images OLYMPEX V1
summary: The GPM Ground Validation GOES 15 Visible and Infrared Images OLYMPEX dataset contains visible and infrared images from the GOES 15 Imager during the GPM Ground Validation Olympic Mountains Experiment (OLYMPEX) field campaign held in the Pacific Northwest. The GOES 15 images are available for all dates between November 5, 2015 and May 1, 2016 at 15 minute intervals. The GPM Ground Validation GOES 15 OLYMPEX dataset files are available in PNG format.
